name: Arcade Kids Games
description:
This great app contains 5 arcade mini games specially designed for kids. They will be able to enjoy driving a car, guiding a funny character, breaking blocks, catching objects, cutting fruits, driving a spaceship and much more with this games.
Just like in other pescAPPs games, you will find a game with some characteristics, such as easy control, accessible for any kid, facile to understand, funny, colorful, pleasant, and free!

pescAPPs’ aim has always been toward making the better applications for your kids, specially designed and developed for them in order to make them learn while playing.
